# SchemaInfo.ClassAttributeMode enumeration

Relation that allows to connect an available attribute to an entity

```csharp
public enum ClassAttributeMode
```

## Values

| name | value | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| ViaElement | `1` | The attribute is directly defined in an IfcClass |
| ViaRelationType | `2` | The attribute is defined in the type that can be related to an Ifc Class |
